title: Cuomo, Once New York’s No. 1 Democrat, Is Doing Little to Help His Party
description: Former Gov. Andrew Cuomo vowed to financially support like-minded Democrats, but as his party battles to retain power, a promised super PAC has not materialized.
dc:creator: Luis Ferré-Sadurní
media:credit: Victor J. Blue for The New York Times
media:description: Although Andrew Cuomo vowed to create a super PAC to help like-minded candidates, he has not yet done so.
